mdRecord.dcterms:title: HANK WILLIAM GRACE AND VIOLENCE...
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Roanoke based artist, curator, and educator Brian ieveking blurs the boundaries between history, mythology and pop culture. ieveking comments \My work draws upon my lifelong interest in history, popular culture, the odd and the arcane particularly as it relates to the mythology if of the outh\ Hank Williams Grace And Violence is part of a large series in which the artist created cryptic and iconic images in a style similar to commercial art to emphasize culture's commodification of outhern symbols. ieveking's work is held in public and private collections in 14 states and seven countries. He is a long time collector and researcher of southern folk art and has curated, lectured and written extensively on the subject.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia,Art,PAINTING
mdRecord.dcterms:medium: Oil, wax crayon, collaged paper and gesso Unstretched canvas
